results.title: Mechanism and application of metformin in kidney diseases: An update.
results.text_hl: Besides, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ inhibits @GENE_CFTR @GENE_1080 @@@cystic fibrosis transmembrane conductance regulator@@@ (@GENE_CFTR @GENE_1080 @@@CFTR@@@)-mediated fluids secretion and the @GENE_MTOR @GENE_2475 @@@mammalian target of rapamycin@@@ (@GENE_MTOR @GENE_2475 @@@mTOR@@@)-involved @<m>DISEASE_Neointima</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058426 @@@cyst formation@@@ negatively regulated by @GENE_PRKAA2 @GENE_5563 @@@AMPK@@@ in @DISEASE_Polycystic_Kidney_Autosomal_Dominant @DISEASE_MESH:D016891 @@@autosomal dominant polycystic kidney disease@@@ (APDKD).

results.title: Metformin slows liver cyst formation and fibrosis in experimental model of polycystic liver disease.
results.journal: Am J Physiol Gastrointest Liver Physiol
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ slows the development of @<m>DISEASE_Neointima</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058426 @@@cyst formation@@@ and @DISEASE_Fibrosis @DISEASE_MESH:D005355 @@@fibrosis@@@ with the activation of @GENE_PRKAA2 @GENE_78975 @@@AMPK@@@ and inhibition of signaling cascades responsible for cellular proliferation and @DISEASE_Fibrosis @DISEASE_MESH:D005355 @@@fibrosis@@@ in the liver of PCK @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.NEW & NOTEWORTHY This study indicates that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, an indirect @GENE_PRKAA2 @GENE_78975 @@@AMPK@@@ activator slows @DISEASE_Liver_Failure @DISEASE_MESH:D017093 @@@liver cyst formation@@@ and @DISEASE_Fibrosis @DISEASE_MESH:D005355 @@@fibrosis@@@ in @DISEASE_Polycystic_liver_disease @DISEASE_MESH:C536330 @@@PLD@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rat@@@ model.
